question: Is ALL music haraam?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Music is expressly prohibited in many Ahaadith. Among the dominant purposes
of our beloved Prophet (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) was to destroy musical
instruments. (Mishkat vol.2). Ref. http://www.jamiat.org.za/v41ifta.html

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
